content: उलूकः {@--1@} An owl; नोलूकोप्यवलोकते यदि दिवा सूर्यस्य किं दूषणं <ls>Bh. 2. 93</ls> त्यजति मुदमुलूकः प्रीतिमांश्चक्रवाकः <ls>Śi. 11. 64.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Indra. {@--3@} (<ab>pl.</ab>) <ab>N.</ab> of a country and its king who was an ally of the Kurus. --कं <ab>N.</ab> of the reed Saccharum Cylindricum; see उलप.
